name: Beta Friendfeed Mini
description:
For the Friendfeed beta (beta.friendfeed.com), suitable for using in a mini window or a window that will not take up any room. Before activating this style, open your list that you want to monitor or select it from a bookmark. Removes header, search box, footer, and sidebar selectors, and adjusts margins.

Just made a quick fix, this screwed up profile pages!
